name: Shrink New Tab Thumbnails - Firefox
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Displays 5 x 3 tiles on Firefox 42, at least on my system
obsoletion_message: Changes to the new tab page have rendered this style obsolete. Also, you would need to use userContent.css.
additional_info: Updated 11/21/2015 to remove more whitespace around elements so tiles can be a bit larger and better fit three rows of five.
